title: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project availability issue
description: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project availability issue (1GFKW5S) When both P1 and P2 are selected, Open Project menu item is available but Close Project is not.
OB: When P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: When P1 and P2 are selected, either both Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available, or neither of them should be available.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select both P1 and P2 in the Navigator.
2. Observe that the Open Project menu item is available, while the Close Project menu item is not.
